amendment.description: Amendment sought to require corporations to file a bankruptcy case in the district court of the district where their principal place of business in the United States is located.
amendment.purpose: Amendment Numbered 4 printed in House Report 108-42 requires corporations that file for bankruptcy to do so in the district court that has jurisdiction over the corporation's principal place of business in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sherman amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 269, 1 Present (Roll no. 71).
